all_text_timv: Abelard, Peter, 1079-1142. Vocal music 12th-century chant [sound recording] : Abelard, hymns & sequences for Heloise. Abelard, hymns & sequences for Heloise Hymns & sequences for Heloise Twelfth-century chant Farnham, Surrey : Herald : Schola Gregoriana of Cambridge Trust, [1994] ℗1994 1 audio disc (96 min.) : digital ; 4 3/4 in. performed music prm rdacontent audio s rdamedia audio disc sd rdacarrier Compact disc. Program notes in English and French, with lyrics (34 p. : ill.) inserted in container. O quanta qualia (4:30) -- Dolorum solatium (8:56) -- Suscipe (3:23) -- Mater salvatoris (2:14) -- Ne derelinquas me (3:22) -- Sponsus / Winchester Cathedral Choristers (15:46) -- Epithalamica (7:20) -- Magnum salutis gaudium (1:35) -- Quam Pium (3:32) -- Fulcite me floribus (3:20) -- Dum esset rex (1:34) -- De profundis (11:10) -- Samson dux fortissime (10:37). Schola Gregoriana of Cambridge ; Winchester Cathedral Choristers ; Mary Berry, director. Recorded in Winchester Cathedral, February-May, 1993. Gregorian chants. Hymns. Berry, Mary, 1917-2008. Schola Gregoriana of Cambridge. Winchester Cathedral. Choristers.
